fields.title: New
fields.description: This is a new issue that has yet to be reviewed.

fields.title: Investigating
fields.description: The issue is being investigated. The issue will be updated as soon as we know more.

fields.title: Repairing
fields.description: The cause of the issue has been found and now it's being fixed.

fields.title: Fixed
fields.description: The issue has now been fixed. If you are satisfied that the issue has now be resolved you can close it. Otherwise, you may reopen it for further investigation.

fields.title: Reopened
fields.description: The issue has been reopened and requires a response.

fields.title: Closed
fields.description: The issue has now been closed.
